flavor: You might not be a natural at the arcane arts, but you have enough money to make up the difference. While at the academy, did you live beneath your means to fit in or did you flaunt your wealth with fine food and a large suite in the townâ€™s best inn? Were your friends bought, natural, or vanishingly few? And did you pay someone to do your homework?
name: Indulged Scion
